welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Wadsworth, where small-town charm meets big city opportunities. Known for its historic Main Street and friendly community, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fulton International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Fulton International Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Akron/canton Regional Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Commuter Terminal
terminals.description: The commuter terminal at Akron/canton Regional Airport serves regional flights operated by smaller airlines.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wayne County Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Wayne County Airport is responsible for handling all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
